title: [AUDIO] Battlecast Prime Cho'Gath Audio Bugs
body: When using Battlecast Prime Cho'Gath, I've noticed that the SFX for abilties E and R play the intended audio but with default Cho'Gath SFX overlaying as well.

replies.body:
Hey Robertson! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are looking into it!
